name: Grade Objects
description: The Grade Objects Brightspace Data Set returns a list of the grade objects created for your org units. The data set returns a NULL grade scheme value when the grade item is using the default scheme.

columns.name: GradeObjectId
columns.description: Unique grade object identifier

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: Unique org unit identifier. Field can be null.

columns.name: ParentGradeObjectId
columns.description: Parent grade object identifier. Note: Categories are considered Parent grade objects. Category names can be determined by using the ParentGradeObjectId and joining the data set to itself. Field can be null.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Grade object name

columns.name: TypeName
columns.description: Grade object type name. Field can be null.

columns.name: StartDate
columns.description: Start date for the grade object (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: EndDate
columns.description: End date for the grade object (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: IsAutoPointed
columns.description: Indicates if the object is automatically pointed. If this contains a value, the object automatically has points assigned; if it is set to 0, then the grade object must manually have points assigned.

columns.name: IsFormula
columns.description: Is a formula associated with the grade object

columns.name: IsBonus
columns.description: Is bonus grade

columns.name: MaxPoints
columns.description: Maximum points achievable in this grade

columns.name: CanExceedMaxGrade
columns.description: Can user get more than maximum points

columns.name: ExcludeFromFinalGradeCalc
columns.description: Is grade excluded from final grade calculation

columns.name: GradeSchemeId
columns.description: Unique grade scheme identifier. This column returns a null result when the grade item is set to use default scheme. This is intended. Field can be null.

columns.name: Weight
columns.description: Weight associated with the grade. Field can be null.

columns.name: NumLowestGradesToDrop
columns.description: Drop number of lowest grades from the calculated grade

columns.name: NumHighestGradesToDrop
columns.description: Drop number of highest grades from the calculated grade

columns.name: WeightDistributionType
columns.description: Grade weight distribution within category. Field can be null.

columns.name: CreatedDate
columns.description: Date the grade was created (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: ToolName
columns.description: Tool associated with the object. Field can be null.

columns.name: AssociatedToolItemId
columns.description: Unique activity ID associated with the grade object: Dropbox ID, Quiz ID, Discussion ID. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Last time the grade was modified (UTC).

columns.name: ShortName
columns.description: The item or category short name as per the corresponding field in Brightspace. Field can be null.

columns.name: GradeObjectTypeId
columns.description: ID of the grade object type. Possible values:

columns.name: SortOrder
columns.description: Specified sort order of grade objects

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates if the grade object is deleted. Field can be null.

columns.name: DeletedDate
columns.description: Date the grade object was soft deleted. Field can be null.

columns.name: DeletedByUserId
columns.description: ID of the user who deleted the grade object. Field can be null.

columns.name: ResultId
columns.description: Unique release condition result identifier. Field can be null.
